title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Columbus incident has nothing to do with race, but Democrats are exploiting it to divide us. Joe Biden passed the crime bill the left hates when he was in the Senate. Rush on how to deal with emotional liberal celebrities like LeBron James: Ignore 'em. Rush is still making news on CNN, USA Today's Susan Page discusses Pelosi's anger when Rush received the Medal of Freedom during the State of the Union. Rush monologue on how liberals don't respect the Constitution, only respect what adds to their own power. Rush on how liberals teach victimhood in school. Police officer calls in to describe the decisions cops have to make every day.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

It's Earth Day. Rush on how climate change, global warming are ways for liberals to control every aspect of your life. The EIB Timber Update. The mileage tax. Caller writes thank you letters to law enforcement. African-American caller: We are our own worst enemy. As John Kerry globetrots as Biden's climate czar, we go back to 2004, when Rush exposed Kerry as a total phony, putting on a country accent to get a hunting license in Ohio.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

New York school apologizes after uproar over book on police shootings. Rush on how liberals indoctrinate our kids in schools. Covid passports? Spinach passports? Leftists attack midnight snacks. Rush on liberals assaulting your freedom of choice. LeBron James tweet threatening Columbus police officer. African-American conservative responds to LeBron. We should hold GOP politicians accountable. Rush from 1992 TV show on the talking Barbie doll that said, "Math is tough!" New video of Columbus shooting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
